author: benzvibenjamin
title: Spanish courses for universities
description: 拉丁美洲学生对Cardano和Catalyst的信息不甚了解

f6_assessments.q0: 该提案与挑战赛的目标非常一致，因为它试图创建一门课程，其目标是向商业学生宣布关于Cardano和Catalyst的信息。如果成功，这个项目肯定对拉丁美洲和Cardano生态系统都有好处，因为对该大陆来说，它将通过项目融资促进经济激励，对我们的区块链来说，它将带来新的用户来使用我们的技术，从而扩大Cardano的影响力。然而，我在这里有几个小时的工作要做。首先，我们不知道关于这个课程的许多细节。我们知道主要的东西，这将是Cardano和Catalyst。但每个班的具体科目是什么？每堂课会持续多长时间？视频会在什么平台上播放？该课程是免费的还是付费的？该课程的总时长是多少？我们不知道这些细节，说的是这个项目最基本的部分。我还想知道，如果三个团队成员中有两个住在欧洲，这些面对面的会议是如何进行的？这些会议将在哪里举行？他们打算一次会见的学生的平均人数是多少？这些面对面的会议会持续多长时间？总的来说，我喜欢这个想法，但我认为它缺乏细节。影响是肯定的，但为了有更多的安全感，我们将需要了解我们在这里谈论的到底是什么。
f6_assessments.q1: 有关团队似乎没有很好的能力来成功执行这个项目。Benji和Viktor在法国学习商业；Paco是一名记者。他们声称自己都是社区的新成员。那么他们怎么会有必要的准备来推广这个课程？他们没有向我们证明他们已经很好地理解了区块链，他们将能够创建具有高质量内容的课程，并对该主题进行深入研究。我认为，如果他们及时聘请已经在社区工作的人，已经与Cardano合作，并且掌握了技术部分，这个想法会好很多。我不明白商科学生在这里到底能做什么，我明白Paco的作用是宣传这个项目（我想知道什么是公关），但不幸的是，这个团队并没有给我信心去配合创建一个课程 。我认为，正如我所提到的，他们可以包括专门从事区块链的人，然后，是的，分担任务，这样我们就可以了解谁会做什么，然后我们就有必要的信心。关于脚本，作者包括一些项目发展所需的步骤，但我认为缺乏细节。我们无法深入地想象这个过程会是怎样的。例如，在第一步 "创建课程 "中：我在上一主题中提到的所有这些细节都浮现在脑海中，关于主题、持续时间、平台等等。在 "推广和营销 "方面：他们有必要详细说明他们打算与哪些大学接洽（我们不知道会是哪个国家，可能是阿根廷，但这并不明确），如何接洽，如何接洽，以及在社交网络中的营销策略如何，等等。最后，当涉及到财务时，类似于我们在阶段中看到的事情发生了。我们有基本但不详细的信息。每个主题都可以由作者更好地解释。
f6_assessments.q2: 作者提供的信息可以很好地起到监督项目的作用，但这都是关于结果的。简而言之，这将是课程的范围：有多少学生接受了教育，他们在课程后发起了多少提案，课程后中心的形成，等等。但是，如果我们有办法评估过程，而不仅仅是结果，那也会很有趣。因此，我以为这里提供的信息有点肤浅，只涉及分析的一部分。如果团队能与社区其他成员保持联系，将他们在这里选择的数据收集到一份报告中，并向社区其他成员展示，例如在市政厅期间，这将是一件好事。如果任何讲西班牙语的社区能够参与到课程中来，对课程进行评价，并将这种反馈带给社区，那也是非常好的。换句话说，我认为这里有一个可审计的原则，但它应该被深化。

f6_assessments.q0: 所述问题和解决方案与挑战赛非常吻合，因为它旨在提高拉丁美洲人民对Cardano和Catalyst的认识水平。该解决方案的方法具有很高的积极影响潜力，因为根据世界各地的一些研究，年轻人，特别是男性，更有可能参与Cypto/区块链活动。根据我这个来自里约热内卢的巴西人的经验，大多数（如果不是全部）大学生至少听说过加密货币和区块链，但他们中的大多数不知道如何成为这项技术的一部分，或者不了解他们可以从中获得的好处。在商学院提供有关催化剂的西班牙语课程可能会引起这些学生的兴趣，为Cardano/催化剂生态系统、为他们自己和他们的国家创造价值。他们是下一代的商业领袖，所有这些关于Cardano和Catalyst的信息将给他们提供建立新的商业和社会基础设施的手段，为未来几十年做好准备。这些关键绩效指标与挑战赛的关键绩效指标完全吻合，因为他们追求为社区吸引新成员，并支持他们在下一个基金周期提出新建议。我只建议增加一个关键绩效指标，以衡量这些提案的质量，正如挑战书所指出的那样，基于给出的分数。我认为这是一个伟大的想法，可以扩大到包括其他领域，如工程和经济学的学生，以及为巴西学生提供葡萄牙语版本。
f6_assessments.q1: 他们已经有一个由3名拉丁美洲商业学生组成的团队，能够与他们的目标受众产生联系。对所需的工作时间有详细的描述，有明确的步骤计划，有具体的行动和截止日期，预算是合理的，只占挑战总预算的不到1%。他们确定了风险，并提供了可能的解决方案来减轻风险。我只是错过了关于课程如何进行的信息，如当面或在线，直播或录制，在哪个平台或地方，免费或付费，以及关于他们所拥有的技能的信息，这将帮助他们建立一个有效的课程。总之，我坚信这是完全可行的。如果加上这些提到的信息，我就会给第五颗星。
f6_assessments.q2: 他们提供了一个带有里程碑和时间跨度的路线图。然而，我认为可以对课程有更多的说明，如持续时间（小时）和对其内容的期望。这将使我们更容易跟踪课程开发的进展。此外，他们可以指定哪些大学将在开始时推广该课程，以便对第二步进行更好的进度跟踪。关键绩效指标是有意义的，它清楚地定义了这个项目中成功的含义。

f6_assessments.q0: A proposal is a well-laid-out approach to the challenge at hand. The challenge is Latin American students not having enough knowledge about Cardano and Catalyst. The proposal wants to resolve it by creating a course about Catalyst for Latin American students. This clearly addresses the challenge
f6_assessments.q1: The team appears to be well versed with the requirements and has the essential expertise to make this proposal a reality. The team has provided the voters with a clear action plan with steps needed to be taken. The proposal was also given a detailed budget breakdown and the fund requested also appears to be reasonable hence the possibility of the proposal being implemented successfully is high
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal consists of well-laid-out steps and KPIs that auditors can use to track the progress of the proposal. the team has also mentioned possible challenges and risks the team might face during the implementation and has also given a complete fund allocation all this information will be enough to track and audit the progress of the proposal successfully.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal certainly fits the challenge of acquiring more users and adoption for Cardano. Bringing common knowledge about Cardano to students of universities in Latin America. Creating a catalyst for Latin American students in business schools. The given solution completely solves the problem.
f6_assessments.q1:
Clear, detailed plan and proposed milestones seem very easy to achieve the set goals
A number of potential risks and challenges have been identified and the proponent offers solutions to address some of them. Offer to give clear step by step plan with different milestones as mentioned earlier as well as potential challenges or risks he may face
The downside of this suggestion is that you don't provide enough information, it would be better if you add background and need proof of your experience for the community to believe
f6_assessments.q2:
A clear roadmap with 3-month milestones is provided. A reasonable timeline and solid goals were presented.
An entire section with easily tracked KPIs along with a list of plans after the first 3 months will increase the transparency of this project and proposal. I agree that the suggested data and success criteria are accurate for measuring progress in the challenge
The stated budget is reasonable enough and it makes me completely agree that the team can tackle the challenge. Very well thought out and presented budget

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is addresses directly the challenge through elevating Cardano's awarenes in the business school students communities in Mexico and Argentina who in turn could turn into multipliers and active members of the Cardano Community. I believe this is a powerful way to expand in Latam eventhough the scale of the proposal is somewhat small limiting it's initial potential it has a huge potential to scale into a significant force.
f6_assessments.q1:
-The team seems to have a clear idea of how to implement the proposal and have identified risks.
-No evidence has been provided of the team's knowledge and capacities to create content a course on Cardano.
-The budget seems reasonable for the proposed task. It would be great to see how the initiative would scale in future funds.
-The proposal has a detailed implementation plan with defined timeframe, KPIs and goals.
f6_assessments.q2:
- The proposal is implementation and success is easily verifiable as the course would have to be produced but also by verifying the existance of the community and it's activity.
- Proposed KPIs and goals make sense and can be used to asess the success of the proposal's implementation.

f6_assessments.q0: Oganizing course for young people in universities is a great way to expose them to Cardano ecosystem. Since the first attention, they can be attracted to become new member of Cardano Catalyst community. The students community is also sensitive with information like that, so hopefully they will spread the information to their peers. Plus, organizing course in universities is a traditional way, simple but effective.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal includes detail plan with actionable steps. The project is quite simple and familiar with university student so he might handle it well with preparation and support from Catatlyst (He just need some money to start!). The budget also be explained well. There is only a risk that his ability is not good enough to organize such event but I assume optimistically that it's a small risk.
f6_assessments.q2: The KPIs is clear with quantity numbers for each goal. I'm looking forward to these young people to join the community and their attribute afterward.

solution: 为商学院的拉美学生专门开设一门关于催化剂的课程
experience:
商学院学生
来自拉丁美洲（阿根廷和墨西哥）的人
讲西班牙语的人
